name: fabric-gethistory
title: Get History
description: This activity fetches history of a key from fabric ledger
author: Yueming Xu

inputs.name: key
inputs.description: state key of the record to be fetched

outputs.name: message
outputs.description: error message if failed to create JSON string

outputs.name: key
outputs.description: state key of the fetched history records

outputs.name: result
outputs.description: array of JSON objects corresponding to history records from ledger
